text: Using the scale provided as a guide, indicate how much you agree or disagree with each of the following statements. Give only one answer for each statement:
When I cry I always know why
answers: strongly disagree|moderately disagree|neither disagree nor agree|moderately agree|strongly agree

text: Daydreaming is a waste of time
